appStages.name: Introduction
Fraud Claim Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eClaims Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload the customer\u0027s fraud claim e-mail chain as a PDF to be analyzed. If not available, upload the filled fraudulent transaction report forms (in PDF format) instead. Press \u0027Analyze\u0027 to begin the analysis process.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",

      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },

    {
      "label": "Fraud Claim Analysis",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,

    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"mt-3\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv style\u003d\"overflow-x: auto; margin-top: -9px; margin-left: 22px; max-width: 95%;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"max-height: 200px; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7; border-radius: 8px;\"\u003e\r\n      \u003ctable class\u003d\"table\" style\u003d\"min-width: 800px; width: 100%; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003cthead style\u003d\"position: sticky; top: 0; background-color: #EEEEEE; z-index: 1;\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr style\u003d\"color: #000000;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\" style\u003d\"color: #000000; font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7; background-color: #EEEEEE; border-top-left-radius: 8px;\"\u003eFIELD NAME\u003c/th\u003e\r\n            \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\" style\u003d\"color: #000000; font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7; background-color: #EEEEEE; border-top-right-radius: 8px;\"\u003eDESCRIPTION\u003c/th\u003e\r\n          \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n        \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n        \u003ctbody class\u003d\"small\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eClaim_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eUnique identifier for each fraud claim.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eCustomer_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eIdentifier for the customer associated with the claim.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eTransaction_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eIdentifier for the disputed transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eClaim_Date\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDate when the fraud claim was filed.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eStatement\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eFree-text explanation provided regarding the suspected fraud.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eStatus\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eCurrent resolution status of the fraud claim.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDate\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDate the original transaction occurred.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eMerchant\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eThe merchant or vendor involved in the transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eAmount\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eMonetary value of the transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eLocation\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eGeographical location where the transaction took place.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDevice_ID\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDevice identifier used for the transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003ePayment_Method\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eMethod used to complete the transaction (e.g., Credit Card, PayPal).\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eName\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eFull name of the customer.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eEmail\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eCustomerâs email address.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eAccount_Type\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eType of bank account associated with the transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eFraud_Risk_Score\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eRisk score indicating likelihood of fraudulent behavior.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eTransactionDate\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eDate the transaction occurred (used again in summary/recommendation/follow-up datasets).\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eSuymmary\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eNatural language summary of the fraud claim and its resolution.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eRecommendateAction\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7;\"\u003eSuggested next step or action to be taken for the claim.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003ctr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7; border-bottom-left-radius: 8px;\"\u003eFollowUpMessage\u003c/td\u003e\r\n            \u003ctd style\u003d\"padding:8px; border: 1px solid #D6D6D7; border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;\"\u003eAuto-generated customer communication about the claim outcome.\u003c/td\u003e\r\n          \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n        \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n      \u003c/table\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "hidden": true,
      "key": "html4",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
